HomePage.How many words can you make with 7 lette: How many words can you make with 7 letters?
HomePage.instruction: Create words using letters from the hive and try to get the maximum score.
HomePage.rule1: Words must have at least four letters.
HomePage.rule2: Words must include the center letter.
HomePage.rule3: Letters can be used more than once.
HomePage.rule4: Words with hyphens, proper nouns, vulgarities, and especially obscure words are not in the word list.
HomePage.scoring: Score points to increase your top-score
HomePage.point2: Each puzzle includes at least one “pangram” which uses every letter. These are worth 7 extra points!
HomePage.time2: +15 seconds is added for each known correct word.
HomePage.start1: Press the "start" button to start the game. Press "new letters" to get new word.
